original: intros H. pose (div_rem_spec1 n p). pose (div_rem_spec2 n p). pose (div_rem_uniq p (div n p) (rem n p) 0 n). intros. destruct (div_full n p) as [k [r [Hk Hr]]]. destruct (H0 Hp) as [_ Hr_bound]. destruct (H1 Hp). apply Nat.lt_le_trans with (r + 0). ++ apply Hr_bound. ++ apply Nat.add_le_mono. ** auto with arith. ** apply Nat.le_0_l. apply H with (div n p) r 0 n. - apply Hp. - rewrite Hk. replace (0 * p + n) with n by auto with arith. apply H. - apply Hr. - apply Nat.lt_le_trans with r. + apply Hr_bound. + auto with arith. auto.
